backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing contact form submissions and user profiles with access-controlled admin and user queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature removals tied to frontend files and associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining color tokens, variables, and global light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with title and root container, loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component rendering the hero, services, contact form, and admin panel toggle.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSubmi: Admin dashboard handling authentication, profile setup flow, permission checks, and viewing submissions.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSet: Renders a profile setup form allowing users to submit their name and handles save errors and navigation back.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Validated contact form with submission handling, success/error states, and backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSubmissions.t: Fetches all contact submissions for admins once an authenticated actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Retrieves the current user's profile using the authenticated actor and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and context management for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: Checks whether the authenticated caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Saves the caller's user profile and invalidates the related profile query on success.
Submits a contact form to the backend and invalidates submission queries afterward.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables including light and dark color palettes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge and normalize Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current build plan for a single‑page marketing site for ASHA PF CONSULTANCY, including architecture notes and feature definitions. Lists existing features such as layout sections, visual theme, and contact form functionality and integration requirements.
